title: 求一份LP的CMI基础权限设置
author: huzpsb
txt_content:
我是很蒙的,因为我才发现CMI玩家默认没有任何权限,这就很艹
求一份LP可以导入的CMI的无害权限表,比如说tpa啊sell之类的权限都给上

replies.author: IceCC
replies.txt_content:
cmi.command.afk
cmi.command.afk.auto
cmi.command.afk.kickbypass
cmi.command.back
cmi.command.balance
cmi.command.baltop
cmi.command.fly.safelogin
cmi.command.hat
cmi.command.helpop
cmi.command.home
cmi.command.homes
cmi.command.ignore
cmi.command.list
cmi.command.mail
cmi.command.msg
cmi.command.money
cmi.command.overwrite
cmi.command.ping
cmi.command.removehome
cmi.command.sethome
cmi.command.sethome.3 - 3为可设置家的数量
cmi.command.sethome.overwrite
cmi.command.sit.spawn
cmi.command.sit.stairs
cmi.command.spawn
cmi.command.suicide
cmi.command.time
cmi.command.tpa
cmi.command.tpaccept
cmi.command.tpahere
cmi.command.tpbypass
cmi.command.tpdeny
cmi.command.warp

复制代码

replies.author: IceCC
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 All.Hail.CCC 于 2020-6-9 14:04 编辑 

骚等,我这刚好是LP+CMI我发给你

replies.author: huzpsb
replies.txt_content:
All.Hail.CCC 发表于 2020-6-9 14:07
怎么导入啊QaQ
谢谢

replies.author: IceCC
replies.txt_content:
huzpsb 发表于 2020-6-9 14:08
怎么导入啊QaQ
谢谢
我都是手动弄的,不知道有其他什么方式可以导入
要手动哦,如果用你是用默认H2或者其他数据库可以输入/lp editor,网页编辑快
或者手动输入/lp group default permission set 权限 true

replies.author: IceCC
replies.txt_content: 还有这里有更多其他详细的权限:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=931567
